details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.11 Version and conformance level identification - PDF/A Identification Schema properties.
details.description: The PDF/A Identification schema defined in Table 6 uses the namespace URI "http://www.aiim.org/pdfa/ns/id/". The required schema namespace prefix is pdfaid. It contains the following properties: pdfaid:part (Open Choice of Integer), pdfaid:amd (Open Choice of Text), pdfaid:corr (Open Choice of Text), pdfaid:conformance (Open Choice of Text).

rule.description: The PDF/A Identification schema defined in Table 6 uses the namespace URI "http://www.aiim.org/pdfa/ns/id/". The required schema namespace prefix is pdfaid. It contains the following fields: pdfaid:part (Open Choice of Integer), pdfaid:amd (Open Choice of Text), pdfaid:conformance (Open Choice of Text)

error.message: A property of the PDF/A Identification Schema has an invalid namespace prefix
